subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Gourd}} {{wikipedia|Cucurbita|Squash}} {{wikipedia|Melon}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|うり}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|-}}, from {{inh|ja|jpx-pro|*ori}}. Found in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', compiled some time after 759 CE. Possibly derived as the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|熟る|tr=uru||to ripen}}, modern form {{m|ja|熟れる|tr=ureru}}. Possibly cognate with {{cog|ko|오이||cucumber}}; compare other terms in the Japonic family, such as {{cog|kzg|瓜|tr=ui}} and {{cog|yox|瓜|tr=ui}}.
